fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Don Armor (Day): Use one brilder to ~~make yourself death immune~~ give yourself basic defense tonight. Usable Day 1.
- Stand Guard (Night): ~~Occupy~~ Roleblock everyone targeting your target. You cannot target the same target 2 nights in a row. Gain 1 brilder for each ability prevented.
> - ~~Cannot target King/Self.~~
> - ~~Self-targeting will cancel.~~
- Shield (Night): Perpetually shield target player throughout multiple nights, preventing 1 attack. Upon success, earn +3 brilders. Shield ends on success (or target changes).
> - ~~Cannot target King/Self.~~
> - ~~Self-targeting will cancel.~~

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Brilder Hungry: Immune to ~~occupy~~ roleblock and redirect.
- Protection Services: You start with 2 brilders, and gain more with successful ability uses. ~~Gain 10 gold for each brilder above the objective.~~

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
- The passive "Gain 10 gold for each brilder above the objective." does not apply.
- Swap out every instance of "occupy" with "roleblock".
- Control immune.
- Don Armor grants Basic defense rather than Death immunity.
- Remove the self-targeting and King targeting mechanics from Stand Guard and Shield.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Finish the game with at least 7 brilders.
